description:
Linux kernel 6.11 reached end of life and all users are now recommended to upgrade their systems to the latest Linux 6.12 kernel series as soon as possible.

The post Linux Kernel 6.11 Reaches End of Life, It’s Time to Upgrade to Linux Kernel 6.12 LTS appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Linux Kernel 6.11 Reaches End of Life, It’s Time to Upgrade to Linux Kernel 6.12 LTS

description:
Alpine Linux 3.21 distribution is now available for download with Linux kernel 6.12 LTS, initial support for LoongArch64, GNOME 47, KDE Plasma 6.2, and more. Here’s what’s new!

The post Alpine Linux 3.21 Released with Linux Kernel 6.12 LTS, Initial LoongArch64 Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Alpine Linux 3.21 Released with Linux Kernel 6.12 LTS, Initial LoongArch64 Support

description:
Linux kernel 4.19 reached end of life and all users are now recommended to upgrade their systems to the latest Linux 6.12 kernel series as soon as possible.

The post Linux 4.19, the Last Supported Kernel of the Linux 4.x Series, Reaches End of Life appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Linux 4.19, the Last Supported Kernel of the Linux 4.x Series, Reaches End of Life

description:
Linux kernel 6.12 is now officially marked as LTS (Long-Term Support) on the kernel.org website and it will be supported until December 2026.

The post It’s Official: Linux Kernel 6.12 Will Be LTS, Supported for “Multiple Years” appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: It’s Official: Linux Kernel 6.12 Will Be LTS, Supported for “Multiple Years”

description:
NVIDIA 565 graphics driver for Linux, FreeBSD, and Solaris systems is now available for download with various improvements and bug fixes. Here’s what’s new!

title: NVIDIA 565 Linux Graphics Driver Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New
